docstr: `RRSPACING` â€” Reciprocal of the relative spacing ### Description `RRSPACING(X)` returns the reciprocal of the relative spacing of model numbers near `X`. ### Syntax `RESULT = RRSPACING(X)` ### Arguments . ### Return value The return value is of the same type and kind as `X`. The value returned is equal to `ABS(FRACTION(X)) * FLOAT(RADIX(X))**DIGITS(X)`. ### Standard Fortran 95 and later ### Class Elemental function ### See also SPACING
